name: SmartFacility.in
description: Facility and energy management on cloud
overview:
SmartFacility.in provides a cloud based solution to make the facilities smart be it a commercial building or a mall or a hospital or an educational campus. SmartFacility.in provides most comprehensive solutions for energy management, property management, safety and security, parking, building management etc. It is developed by industry professionals with the knowledge of the core utility and infrastructure industry and takes care of the real business processes and their complexities. A smart facility can be defined as the facility which • uses technology and tools to run the operations smoothly and safely, • meet all the regulations, • provide necessary and timely services to clients, • maintain communication with stakeholders, • keep facility neat and clean, • be energy efficient and environment friendly

SmartFacility.in provides a solution to achieve all this. It provides a framework to integrate the existing systems, necessary tools and technologies, facility micro site for communication and information collection / dissemination and systems and procedures. Please visit www.SmartFacility.in for more information or drop a mail at contact@smartfacility.in for further information.
